item.title: Cross Referencing Hugo
item.description: In my blog, have started to cross-refernce now. Hugo has got support for this and designed in such a way that really make sense to me. Documentation for this is here: https://gohugo.io/content-management/cross-references/ So to reference some post, you need to know about file path of that post. Proper reading would have made it easier but spent around 2hrs for this stupid things. The ref and relref shortcodes require a single parameter: the path to a content document, with or without a file extension, with or without an anchor.
